mapper.insert: insert into image (ID, DATA_ID, TABLE_NAME, EXTEND_TYPE, URL, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, STATUS) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dataId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extendType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update image
DATA_ID = #{dataId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTEND_TYPE = #{extendType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
